I got this cyberpunk jacket for my sexy DJ husband, who’s not only a music genius but an overall badass. Let me just say, this jacket is the perfect mix of edgy, cool, and functional, basically, it’s him in clothing form. From the detachable sleeves to the oversized fit, it screams “I own the night,” which is exactly the vibe he brings to his sets ;)  The Japanese Kanji design? Absolutely iconic. It adds that touch of mystery and flair that makes him look like he’s stepped out of a futuristic movie. And the heavy-duty fabric? Perfect for those late-night outdoor gigs. Plus, the hoodie is big enough to keep him warm but still looks super stylish, no floppy, awkward hoodie moments here.  Watching him wear this jacket at his sets is a whole mood. It’s like his music and the jacket were made to vibe together, and I can’t stop swooning (or bragging). If you want your partner to look like they’re about to save the world and drop the sickest beat of the year, this jacket is it. 10/10, highly recommend for him, and for me because wow!
I had someone say they really liked it first day on... would definitely buy from this company again in a different style

It's a lightweight windbreaker material. However, that is not to be confused with feeling cheap at all. It's very well made and feels durable. I'm 5'11 - 6ft tall and about 170lbs and the medium fits just as it does in the photo. The lower sleaves and cowl hood are detachable, should you desire to. The hood, while light weight, also has a very rigid and sturdy sort of stitness to it. This way it lays almost in the fashion of the grim reapers hood and doesn't droop or drape down. 9 out of 10 for me. This thing is dope

Definitely runs large, I expected oversized but manageable but I wear a M T-shirt and a L in most jackets so I went with an L. 5' 7" around 195 pounds. Going to swap for a size down and see how I like the fit.  Heavier (and less annoying than a windbreaker) than expected, feels like it'll be good for the rain. The hood is ENORMOUS, like it's massive. Makes a super nice silhouette when up, could probably wear a hoodie underneath.

Quality was very nice but if you want it to fit like the guy in the picture you're going to have to size up a lot. For reference I am 6'1" 245. The jacket fit nice as a regular everyday jacket. This is a very cool looking coat, but it is absolute GARBAGE. Very poorly made. I had to launder the coat and it literally fell apart in the wash. The quality of this jacket is excellent. Stitching looks great the material is that of a light spring jacket this is not a winter coat but seems like it would hold the warmth in very well with a sweat shirt underneath. Good length on body and arms. Zippers function properly and it looks very cool. Only problem I had is they sent the wrong size. With this being American made Japanese streetwear the issue of things being too short for the American consumer does not seem to be a problem. I did my research and knew this was an American company so I only ordered you one size to be able to have a hoodie worn underneath it, but received two sizes up instead which is far too big. That is not to say anything against Niepce they made a great looking and perfect quality product, Amazon just sent the wrong size. They did address it immediately and made it right with me so no bad energy towards Amazon either. But I do have to now wait for my funds to be returned so I can reorder the proper size directly from Niepce. It was meant to be a birthday gift so it will have to be a belated gift now.. but again Amazon is working with me to correct the issue. If you're wondering about ordering this jacket.. I say go for it, it's very nice and accidents happen. I doubt they're intentionally sending out the wrong size. For a 6'3" guy at about 165lbs and I think the Large will fit perfectly.
The jacket is extremely comfortable and fits well if you order a size above, it also works really great for cosplay, all in all I’m not disappointed in what I got
even at 3x the jacket is incredibly tight. size and shape should be more transparent
Awesome jacket! Fits well and looks sick. Only complaint is the hood doesn’t stay up like in the photo. Also the hood is crazy big… like almost too big even for K-pop style

Now this item was sized for an actual human, XXL was actually XXL. Probably the only time buying something from the orient that didnt fit like a blood pressure cuff. Definitely would recommend and even buy again.

评论概述: Really nice pull over, great material!
评论详情: The X.G.F.X pull over is very nice! I generally don't get to wear it often since I live in Southern California and it's always warm. However when it does rain or gets cold this jacket comes in very handy. The style and material are top quality and can easily be used as tactical wear without the expensive price. All of the pockets are functional and can be used for eDC purposes. The velcro for the top pockets tape very well and won't wear after regular wash with the print holding up the same with no visible signs of fade or chipping after wash. I ride a motorcycle as my everyday transport and this pullover keeps me warmer than the average to thick zipper hoodie. This pullover is a great addition to any wardrobe and can just be fashionably for cooler early spring and fall seasons. I have to add that as a typica zipper hoodie person, I like the 3quarter zipper/button style giving it a more breathable function when needed and the material doesn't make the horrible windbreaker sound like I'm wearing a trash bag. I would definitely recommend this jacket to anyone looking for style, function and quality at a great price.

评论概述: The windbreaker hood is not complete is missing some part.
评论详情: I don’t like it because this was a Christmas present for my grandson, now I need to wait for the replacement.

The jacket is nicely made overall, the sleeves and hood are mildly infuriating to put on and take off sometimes. Something about using zippers for circular sleeves isn't quite conducive to quick removal. Periodically i managed to nearly snatch the hood off as its held with a few buttons, it held up at a concert i recently went to though and was reasonably comfortable to wear. As a windbreaker, it is not thick and hot. It is currently winter in my state and I'm seeing temps in and below the 30s. The lowest i wore this windbreaker comfortably was the high 30s and i was a little cold after extended time outside. The graphic on the sleeve seems to be of good quality and has not started to peel or anything after about 1 week. The size i ordered(XL) was pretty dead on, i initially worried whether it would be a bit small on me but when it arrived i was satisfied to see that it fit perfectly. The hood can be a little ackward to wear, the best way I've found is with the two buckles fastened instead of just lying flat on my shoulders, where its more prone to get snatched off.
Love everything about it except that it's very thin but hey I couldn't help give it 5 stars my new favorite jacket wll most likely buy two more ^_^

Came earlier than expected. Super light. Super comfy. Looks better than the photo. Im actually quite enjoying the material, easy for my body to breathe. Definately not a winter jacket, but it does help alot. I like the idea of the detatchable hood. Although ive noticed it sits kinda funny in the neck/collar part. The straps are more for show as they are stitched together, takes a tiny bit of adjusting but its o.k. also, as a person who does alot of stitching myself, its not really an issue. Quick simple easy fix. The hood iss way bigger than i thought it to be, definately good for raining weather, though ristricting view a little bit bevause of the depth of the hood, but, again, not really an issue. All together, im very impressed. Super comfy, would definately buy from these guys again!

Easy to clean, water and stain resistant, comfortable,light, oversize hood is great, removable sleeves and hood are convenient. $60 is a tad high priced, I would have felt better with $40...but it is a hard to find new style delivered so yeah.

I had this for only a few weeks and the zipper started warping and coming off. This jacket has otherwise been great for shielding against cold winds and rainy weather but now it's useless. If a stronger zipper was used for this product it would have been fine..
